original_text: For yet seven days, and I will cause it to rain upon the earth forty days and forty nights; and every living substance that I have made will I destroy from off the face of the earth.
korean_text: 지금부터 칠 일이면 내가 사십 주야를 땅에 비를 내려 내가 지은 모든 생물을 지면에서 쓸어버리리라

sentences.original_text: and I will cause it to rain upon the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 땅 위에 비를 내리게 하리니

sentences.original_text: and every living substance that I have made
will I destroy from off the face of the earth
